venue.name: Cambridge Innovation Center (CIC) - 5th Floor - Havana Room

item.description:
What do Steve Jobs, Ray Dalio, Bill George, Marc Beinoff and Phil Jackson have in common? ..They are visionaries, have been known to lead and inspire teams, and have achieved significant success in their professional lives. They have one more thing in common â€“ meditation.

So come find out how you can be the visionary you aspire to be!!.. All that and enjoy great music and food.. as well!

All proceeds from the evening will be donated to the Empowered Voices NGO working on community development projects in Uganda.

Seats are limited.. so buy your tickets today at : http://musicnmeditationmixer.eventbrite.com
item.name: Music n Meditation Mixer
